targets.query:
from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_usage_idle" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostlist:regex}$/)
  |> drop(columns: ["cpu"])
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 98.00)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({host:r.host,_value: float(v: r.elapsed), _time: r._time, _start: r._start, _stop:r._stop }))
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_usage_idle" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostlist:regex}$/)
  |> drop(columns: ["cpu"])
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] < 98.00 and r["_value"] > 1.00)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({host:r.host,_value: float(v: r.elapsed), _time: r._time, _start: r._start, _stop:r._stop }))
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_usage_idle" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostlist:regex}$/)
  |> drop(columns: ["cpu"])
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] <= 1)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({host:r.host,_value: float(v: r.elapsed), _time: r._time, _start: r._start, _stop:r._stop }))
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem_used_percent" or r["_measurement"] == "mem_total")
  |> toFloat()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostlist:regex}$/)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({host:r.host,_value: r.mem_total * (r.mem_used_percent/100.00), _time: r._time, _start: r._start, _stop:r._stop }))
  |> mean()

from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem_available_percent" or r["_measurement"] == "mem_total")
  |> toFloat()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostlist:regex}$/)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({host:r.host,_value: r.mem_total * (r.mem_available_percent/100.00), _time: r._time, _start: r._start, _stop:r._stop }))
  |> mean()

from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem_available_percent" or r["_measurement"] == "mem_used_percent" or r["_measurement"] == "mem_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostlist:regex}$/)
  |> toFloat()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({host:r.host,_value: (100.00 - (r.mem_used_percent + r.mem_available_percent)) / 100.00 * r.mem_total, _time: r._time, _start: r._start, _stop:r._stop }))
  |> mean()

from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "powerstat_package_current_power_consumption_watts" or r["_measurement"] == "powerstat_package_current_dram_power_consumption_watts")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostlist:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns:["host"])
  |> keep(columns:["host","_value"])
  |> sum()

panels.description: Time Spent by host being more than 98% idle

targets.query:
from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_usage_idle" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostlist:regex}$/)
  |> drop(columns: ["cpu"])
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 98.00)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({host:r.host,_value: float(v: r.elapsed), _time: r._time, _start: r._start, _stop:r._stop }))
  |> sum()

panels.title: Time Spend On Idle

panels.description: Time Spent by host being more than 1% but less 98% idle

targets.query:
from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_usage_idle" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostlist:regex}$/)
  |> drop(columns: ["cpu"])
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] < 98.00 and r["_value"] > 1.00)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({host:r.host,_value: float(v: r.elapsed), _time: r._time, _start: r._start, _stop:r._stop }))
  |> sum()

panels.description: Time Spent by host being less than 1% idle

panels.title: Time Spend On Busy

targets.query:
from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpu_usage_idle" and r.cpu== "cpu-total"
  )
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostlist:regex}$/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({host:r.host,_value: 100.0 - r._value, _time: r._time, _start: r._start, _stop:r._stop }))

from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpu_usage_idle" and r.cpu== "cpu-total"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostlist:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${timeinterval}, fn: mean)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({host:r.host,_value: 100.0 - r._value, _time: r._time, _start: r._start, _stop:r._stop }))

import "strings"

from(bucket:"intel")
          |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
          |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_usage_idle" and r.cpu != "cpu-total")
          |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostlist:regex}$/)
          |> last()
          |> map(fn: (r) => ({hostcpu: strings.joinStr(arr: [r.host,r.cpu ], v: "-"),_value: 100.00 - r._value, _time: r._time, _start: r._start, _stop:r._stop }))
          |> group(columns: ["hostcpu"])
          |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["hostcpu"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: Current Utilization of each logical core

          |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

          |> sort(columns: ["host"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_usage_idle")
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: Node
list.name: hostlist
list.query:
from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_usage_idle")
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "host")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_usage_idle")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group()
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |>sum(column:"elapsed")
  |> map(
        fn: (r) => ({
            elapse: r.elapsed,
            duration: 
            if r.elapsed < 600.00 then "30s" 
            else if r.elapsed > 600.00 and r.elapsed < 3600.00 then "1m"
            else if r.elapsed > 3600.00 and r.elapsed < 86400.00 then "15m"
            else if r.elapsed > 86400.00 and r.elapsed < 259200.00 then "1h"
            else if r.elapsed > 259200.00 and r.elapsed < 432000.00 then "3h"
            else "6h",
           }),
    )
  |>drop(columns:["elapse"])
list.label: Graph Interval
list.name: timeinterval
list.query:
from(bucket: "intel")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_usage_idle")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group()
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |>sum(column:"elapsed")
  |> map(
        fn: (r) => ({
            elapse: r.elapsed,
            duration: 
            if r.elapsed < 600.00 then "30s" 
            else if r.elapsed > 600.00 and r.elapsed < 3600.00 then "1m"
            else if r.elapsed > 3600.00 and r.elapsed < 86400.00 then "15m"
            else if r.elapsed > 86400.00 and r.elapsed < 259200.00 then "1h"
            else if r.elapsed > 259200.00 and r.elapsed < 432000.00 then "3h"
            else "6h",
           }),
    )
  |>drop(columns:["elapse"])
